HardwareAbstractionLayer/ATmega128RFA1/RadioDriver.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  *  Module Name
00003  *
00004  *    RadioDriver
00005  *
00006  *
00007  *  Programmer
00008  *
00009  *    Claus Andersen
00010  *
00011  *
00012  *  Description
00013  *
00014  *    This is a driver for the ATmega128RFA1 build in RF transceiver.
00015  *
00016  *
00017  *  Configuration
00018  *
00019  *    Part of the configuration of the radio driver is done using compile time conditional compilation to
00020  *    save code space and to increase speed. To use these use #defines in the Config.h file in your project.
00021  *
00022  *    *----------------------*--------*-------------------------------------------------------------------*
00023  *    | Name                 | Values | Effect                                                            |
00024  *    *----------------------*--------*-------------------------------------------------------------------*
00025  *    | RADIODRIVER_AUTO_RX  | (none) | If defined the transceiver will always be in the RX_ON mode when  |
00026  *    |                      |        | not transmitting. This enables easy usage of the driver but       |
00027  *    |                      |        | prevents low power mode of the transceiver.                       |
00028  *    *----------------------*--------*-------------------------------------------------------------------*
00029  *    | RADIODRIVER_USE_CRC  | (none) | Defining RADIODRIVER_USE_CRC enables the transceivers build in    |
00030  *    |                      |        | CRC generation and check. Received frames that fail the CRC       |
00031  *    |                      |        | check are silently discarded.                                     |
00032  *    *----------------------*--------*-------------------------------------------------------------------*
00033  *
00034  *
00035  *  Version log
00036  *
00037  *    *---------*--------------*----------*---------------------------------------------------------------*
00038  *    | Version | Date         | Initials | Changes                                                       |
00039  *    *---------*--------------*----------*---------------------------------------------------------------*
00040  *    | 1.00.00 | May 2. 2010  | CA       | First version implemented. Only basic mode is supported       |
00041  *    |         |              |          | though the automatic Frame Check Sequence generator and       |
00042  *    |         |              |          | checker can be enabled.                                       |
00043  *    *---------*--------------*----------*---------------------------------------------------------------*
00044  *
00045  */
00046
